ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic

Class Questionnaire2Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.usz.c3pro.c3_pro_android_framework.questionnaire.logic.Questionnaire2Task

  • public class Questionnaire2Task
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a static class that will provide the conversion of a FHIR Questionnaire Resource to a ResearchStack Task that can be used with a ResearchStack ViewTaskActivity to conduct a survey. Referenced ValueSets in getOptions() of ChoiceQuestions can only be resolved if included in the FHIR questionnaire file. Not all QuestionTypes are supported yet.
    See Also:
    AnswerFormat

      static org.researchstack.backbone.task.Task questionnaire2Task(org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.Questionnaire questionnaire)
      Returns a ResearchStack Task that can be viewed by a ViewTaskActivity based on a FHIR Questionnaire.

    • Method Detail

      • questionnaire2Task

        public static org.researchstack.backbone.task.Task questionnaire2Task(org.hl7.fhir.dstu3.model.Questionnaire questionnaire)
        Returns a ResearchStack Task that can be viewed by a ViewTaskActivity based on a FHIR Questionnaire. If the items have Questionnaire.QuestionnaireItemEnableWhenComponents, the returned Task will be a ConditionalOrderedTask.
        Parameters:
        questionnaire - a HAPI FHIR Questionnaire Resource
        Returns:
        a ResearchStack Task
